headline: Tracking Ray Dalio's Bridgewater Associates 13F Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Bridgewater Associates' Q3 moves: Portfolio value rises to $21.81B. Notable stake reductions were seen in GOOG, NVDA, META, MSFT, and AMZN. See more here.

headline: Coca-Cola Raises Dividend by 5.2%
summary: By Zaeem Shoaib Coca-Cola raised the company's quarterly dividend by 5.2% to 51 cents a share from 48.5 cents a share. The increase approved by the board of directors is equal to $2.04 on an...

headline: Board of Directors of The Coca-Cola Company Approves 63rd Consecutive Annual Dividend Increase
summary: The Board of Directors of The Coca-Cola Company today approved the company’s 63rd consecutive annual dividend increase, raising the quarterly dividend approximately 5.2% from 48.5 cents to 51 cents...

headline: A Soft Drink with a Hard Mission: Functional Soda
summary: The high-fiber, lower-sugar soda-startup Ollipop is officially a unicorn. The company raised $50 million in its Series C funding round at a valuation of $1.85 billion. The funding comes as both...
